name: Ext_R3_ExplanationOfBenefit_it_de_su_net
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ExplanationOfBenefit.item.detail.subDetail.net for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ExplanationOfBenefit.item.detail.subDetail.net from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExplanationOfBenefit|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The quantity times the unit price for an addittional service or product or charge. For example, the formula: unit Quantity * unit Price (Cost per Point) * factor Number  * points = net Amount. Quantity, factor and points are assumed to be 1 if not supplied.
element.comment: `ExplanationOfBenefit.item.detail.subDetail.net` maps to R4B `ExplanationOfBenefit.item.detail.subDetail.net`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.definition: The quantity times the unit price for an addittional service or product or charge. For example, the formula: unit Quantity * unit Price (Cost per Point) * factor Number  * points = net Amount. Quantity, factor and points are assumed to be 1 if not supplied.
element.comment: `ExplanationOfBenefit.item.detail.subDetail.net` maps to R4B `ExplanationOfBenefit.item.detail.subDetail.net`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
